library(biomaRt)

```R
mart <- useMart(biomart="ensembl", dataset="hsapiens_gene_ensembl")
#define the right database
#选择合适的数据库
```


```R
my_results <- getBM(attributes =c("hgnc_symbol"), mart=mart)
#get the list of genes
#获取一系列基因
```


```R
N <- 50
mysample <- sample(my_results$hgnc_symbol, N)
head(mysample)

```


<ol class=list-inline>
	<li>'RNU7-41P'</li>
	<li>'RARRES2P9'</li>
	<li>'SYT17'</li>
	<li>'RFESDP1'</li>
	<li>'NANOGP8'</li>
	<li>'DPP10'</li>
</ol>




```R
seq <- getSequence(id="BRCA1",type="hgnc_symbol", seqType="peptide",mart=mart)
#to retrieve sequence from the databases for a gene
show(seq)
```

```R
Seq2 <- getSequence(id="KNST00000520540",
                    type='ensembl_transcript_id',
                   seqType='gene_flank',
                   upstream=30,
                   mart=mart)
show(Seq2)
#to retrieve a sequence that specifies the chromosome position, the range of the position (upstream and downstream from a site) can be used as well.
```

    [1] gene_flank            ensembl_transcript_id
    <0 rows> (or 0-length row.names)
